be.lreenaers.mirr0r.schema
Class Schema

java.lang.Object
  be.lreenaers.mirr0r.schema.Schema

public class Schema
extends Object

A Schema is the logical representation of a bean. It contains SchemaAssociations that are actually mappings of Csv columns to xml element.

Since:
beta
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ludovic Reenaers

putXmlAssociation

public void putXmlAssociation(String name,
                              String xmlProp)
Sets the XML property of a SchemaAssociation. If the association does not exists, it creates it.

Parameters:
name - The name of the SchemaAssociation.
xmlProp - The value of the XML property (a.k.a element/attribute name)of the association.
